data: 1 - Respect other Cars. World of Cars does not tolerate any swearing, bullying or mean behavior towards other Cars. Disciplinary action will be taken should any of these occur while playing. 2 - No inappropriate talk. References to drugs and alcohol related activities, and sexual, racial or otherwise inappropriate talk are not permitted. 3 - Never reveal personal information. The best way to stay safe online is to NEVER share your real name, phone number, address, email or passwords. 4 - No cheating. Use of third party programs to cheat is prohibited. Players who use third party programs while playing risk being permanently banned.
